35inline array fft(const array& a, int n, int axis, StreamOrDevice s = {}) {
36 return fftn(a, {n}, {axis}, s);
37}
38inline array fft(const array& a, int axis = -1, StreamOrDevice s = {}) {
39 return fftn(a, {axis}, s);
40}
